page_content: The page provides a short guide on digital teaching materials for schools.
The page provides a comprehensive guide on how to file tax returns electronically for the year 2022.
The page provides information on accessing digitized church records for family research.
The page provides information on energy and water metering services in Appenzell.
The page provides a guide on how to use the Digital Library Ostschweiz (Dibiost) for electronic media borrowing.
The page provides information on geobase data, including how to access it through GIS software.
The page provides a guide on how to use the Geoportal for accessing various geodata layers and functionalities.
